name: Ngozi Harrison
body:
## Hello Friend!

My name is Ngozi [en-GO-zee] Harrison. I am a teenager who builds ideas using technology to make life a little bit easier and more fun! I have always been fascinated by technology. Everyday I learn something new about how technology works. My particular interests are:  Computer Science, Data Analysis and Visualization, Graphic design, Information Architecture and Mathematics.

#### You can find my main website at [ngozi.portfoliobox.me](ngozi.portfoliobox.me)
####You can also find me on Quora at [quora.com/Ngozi-Harrison](quora.com/Ngozi-Harrison)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
